page.description: The ' No records found ' message is useful for displaying instances when a query does not return any records. This might be the case, for example, if you were to conduct a Quick search inside a grid for a field that was in the table you selected on the Query page but that does not exist in the Grid Part, you might get this message. Clicking the button [...] to the right of the 'No records found' message loads the HTML editor. This makes it easy to modify the default message to your liking.
